entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
